message.body: Hey, are you still able to stop by and check on Jake later?
Sure can! Just let me know the drill.
(2/2) not going to crate him or anything. I'm leaving at 11 and prob getting back at 11. Ill find a good place for my keys and get back to you.
Thanks so much for doing this!
Great! Does how many times should I take him out?
No problem at all!
(1/2) Oh, just once is fine. He's. Not going to be in the crate which is what he really minds. You can bring him with you if you go somewhere too. I juat want
(2/2) to limit him running around like crazy.
Got it. I'm excited to hang with him! Have a safe trip.
Great! I'm glad.
OK, in the little grass area next to my building is a weird broken chair. Keys are in an empty plastic ice cream pint under the chair.
Okay! I'll text you if I have any trouble when I go over later.
Great.
His leash and poop bags are on my desk. I'd leash him when you take him out even if you're mostly carrying him... he's fast.
I definitely will. Does he need any good or anything?
It's all out for him. If he wants it he'll eat it.
Awesome.
Jake is awesome he is happy to be outside for a little while. We are walking slowly
ï¿¼
Also I love his Springsteen sweater.
Thank you so much!
